mapper.sql: id, user_id, rel_id, type, item, value, create_time, update_time, creator, updater, deleted
mapper.delete: UPDATE data_extra SET value = JSON_REPLACE(value, "$.keyId", NULL, "$.authType", IF( JSON_EXTRACT(value, "$.authType") = 'CUSTOM_KEY', 'DEFAULT', JSON_EXTRACT(value, "$.authType") )) WHERE deleted = 0 AND type = 'HOST' AND item = 'ssh' AND JSON_CONTAINS(value, JSON_OBJECT('keyId', #{keyId}))

UPDATE data_extra SET value = JSON_REPLACE(value, "$.identityId", NULL, "$.authType", IF( JSON_EXTRACT(value, "$.authType") = 'CUSTOM_IDENTITY', 'DEFAULT', JSON_EXTRACT(value, "$.authType") )) WHERE deleted = 0 AND type = 'HOST' AND item = 'ssh' AND JSON_CONTAINS(value, JSON_OBJECT('identityId', #{identityId}))
